author: Tyler Chappell
comment: This has been one of my favorite watch face collections. I had been waiting for some more fruits and now they're here! I look forward to which fruits will be added in a further update. Each fruit has such an excellent and clean design with colors that really pop. Keep up the great work!
title: Awesome New Fruits!

author: Chan Kai Tan
comment: Really like the stylized shapes and colours. Would appreciate an option to show a random slice on a given interval. I'd also like to suggest fruits like mangosteens for purple, tomatoes for deep reds and avocados for a brown/green look.
title: Fruity taste

author: Jody Hertel
comment: Even prettier on a square watch face! Great buy for a buck, not disappointed!
title: Very nice!

author: Jack Z
comment: Best dollar I have ever spent

author: Overcast Skies
comment: My favorite watch face!!
title: Amazing!!

author: Alexandru Pele
comment: beautiful

author: Michael Quevillon
comment: I was afraid that these fruity designs were made with a focus on the round watch faces, but was glad to see that the square designs are as awesome as the round ones. Very well-designed and simple, which is what makes a good watch face, in my mind. I hope more designs will come in the future, but I'm happy with the current choices.
title: Great on square watches

author: S. L.
comment: I am really pissed off. I downloaded it, waited for hours (maybe it has to sync I thought) but the watchface never popped up. I can't refund and wasted 0,99 cents. Thank you.

reply.author: Luigi Notaro
reply.content:
Hi Sebastian,
Sometimes you have to manually sync your watch apps thought the Android Wear app (Settings -> Choose your watch -> tap on Resync).
Please let me know if you were be able to enjoy Fruity Slices!

title: Not on my phone.

author: Christin S.
comment: I'm a produce manager, so these watch faces fit my job perfectly. Also like that I can switch up the faces. First it was melon, now it's grapefruit. Perfect. Thanks!
title: Awesome!

comment: I really like it, but for me there is only one problem... I would like more, it's so nice :)
title: Nice minimal & colorful design

author: Casen
comment: It would be nice if you added digital time. And here are some fruit ideas: blueberry apple strawberry lemon pomegranate and banana! Keep up the GREAT work!
title: Sooooo cute 10000000000000000000+ stars!

author: Danielle Cuttriss
comment: First watch app I bought and love it. Vibrant colours, real nice :) I hope they add more fruity flavours to choose from!!! Lemon pineapple strawberry orange! Passion fruit! 🍓🍋🍇🍊🍍🍉🍑🍏
title: So cute!

author: Brandon Chaney
comment: Sorry I didn't read that it said watch wear. But 5 stars for looking cool
title: Whoops.

author: Paul Komarnicki
comment: These are the best little watch faces to make my watch a bit crazy from time to time 😁
title: So cute 😁

author: Sophie Morland
comment: I love it!
title: Delicious

author: Brootis Rinzler
comment: MORE FRUITS PLEASE!!
title: Review

author: Kenneth Jerney
comment: Lemon next? Or perhaps orange?

author: Tré Retter
comment: Nice and clean.

author: Thomas Nekkers
comment: I love these watchfaces. I switch between the kiwi and the watermelon a lot, but these flat 2D watchfaces are just so aesthetically pleasing.
title: It's just so pretty!

author: Sam Davis
comment: These are some lovely designs and I really love the art style. It would be even better if there was a broader range of fruit to pick from. Classic kiwi is my personal favourite at the moment. Great job - I really like these watch faces.
title: Great Idea

author: Jon Santos
comment: Cool and clean design. Good job!!!
title: Yum!
